metadata.title: CVE-2016-0757 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
OpenStack Image Service (Glance) before 2015.1.3 (kilo) and 11.0.x before11.0.2 (liberty), when show_multiple_locations is enabled, allow remoteauthenticated users to change image status and upload new image data byremoving the last location of an image.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-0757` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

glance - 2:12.0.0-0ubuntu2
glance-api - 2:12.0.0-0ubuntu2
glance-common - 2:12.0.0-0ubuntu2
glance-glare - 2:12.0.0-0ubuntu2
glance-registry - 2:12.0.0-0ubuntu2
python-glance - 2:12.0.0-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glance package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:12.0.0-0ubuntu2').
